snippet: Mrs. Clinton has broadened her economic message, sought endorsements from G.O.P. influencers and pledged that her husband, popular with blue-collar voters, will work to create jobs.
abstract: Hillary Clinton's presidential campaign is hoping to capitalize on Donald J Trump's ascent within Republican Party and is exploring possibility that it can draw both Republican voters and former elected officials as well as former military generals; bid is part of broader effort to pivot to general election and to present message that appeals to independents.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton has broadened her economic message, sought endorsements from G.O.P. influencers and pledged that her husband, popular with blue-collar voters, will work to create jobs.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Targets Republicans Turned Off by Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: Clinton Sets Out to Convert Republican Voters Turned Off by Trump
